replies.body: This post is being locked, and as you can see it has been redacted. You may not use Avicus as a platform to advertise your own network. We have 0 tolerance for posts such as this, this is not a community event. This is more so, an attempt to gain players on your own server. Finally, this is a form of indirect advertising. Please, advertise elsewhere.
